title: A Phase 2a Study of BMS-790052 and BMS-650032 in Combination Therapy With Japanese Subjects With Genotype 1 Chronic Hepatitis C (HCV) Virus Infection

operands.value: Subjects chronically infected with HCV Genotype 1
HCV RNA viral load of ≥ 10*5* IU/mL (100,000 IU/mL) at screening
Must have minimum age of 20 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
Subjects with evidence of liver cirrhosis

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('HCV RNA viral load of ≥ 10*5* IU/mL (100,000 IU/mL) at screening'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 75 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 20 Years'), Symbol('Subjects chronically infected with HCV Genotype 1'), Not(Or(Symbol('Co-infection with HIV'), Symbol('Co-infection with hepatitis B virus'), Symbol('Evidence of HCC'), Symbol('Subjects with evidence of liver cirrhosis'))))
